mapper.insert: insert into w_blog (id, appreciation, commentabled, content, creatTime, first_picture, flag, published, recommend, share_statement, title, updatetime, views, type_id, user_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appreciation,jdbcType=BIT}, #{commentabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{firstPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{published,jdbcType=BIT}, #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT}, #{shareStatement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{views,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: update w_blog set appreciation = #{appreciation,jdbcType=BIT}, commentabled = #{commentabled,jdbcType=BIT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creatTime = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, first_picture = #{firstPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, published = #{published,jdbcType=BIT}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT}, share_statement = #{shareStatement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, views = #{views,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, appreciation, commentabled, content, creatTime, first_picture, flag, published, recommend, share_statement, title, updatetime, views, type_id, user_id from w_blog where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
